36#include "kadm5_locl.h"
37
38__RCSID("$NetBSD: bump_pw_expire.c,v 1.2 2017/01/28 21:31:49 christos Exp $");
39
40/*
41 * extend password_expiration if it's defined
42 */
43
44kadm5_ret_t
45_kadm5_bump_pw_expire(kadm5_server_context *context,
46 hdb_entry *ent)
47{
48 if (ent->pw_end != NULL) {
49 time_t life;
50
51 life = krb5_config_get_time_default(context->context,
52 NULL,
53 365 * 24 * 60 * 60,
54 "kadmin",
55 "password_lifetime",
56 NULL);
57
58 *(ent->pw_end) = time(NULL) + life;
59 }
60 return 0;
61}
62
